website_summaries.verdict: An affordable and cute bath toy that doubles as a water thermometer that sounds an alarm when the water isn't safe.
pros: Beeps when the temperature is too hot or too cold
Automatically turns off when taken out of the water
Works better than some others on the market
cons: Over time, water can get stuck inside this model and cause it to malfunction

customer_reviews.title: Some of the bad reviews on here are from folks that don't read ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy toy/thermometer. Some of the bad reviews on here are from folks that don't read the instructions!! The turtle will beep fast for too hot and slow for too cold. Tips: Give it time to work. You can't expect instant results. When you are done with the bath, shake out the turtle and then blow to air dry the metal part on the bottom, then it won't beep incessantly after. I am giving 4 stars became am having to buy a new one. The screen has water in it after two years. But I like it so much I'm buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: SKLI

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is way off. The first time I used it the temperature read 98 degrees so I placed my son in the bath water thinking it was safe. He started crying. I grabbed the thermometer I was using (a steak thermometer) pre purchase of the turtle to check the water again and the reading was 3 degrees higher. I would not recommend this item at all. If I use it at all it is for my son to play with. Waste of money as far as I am concerned.
customer_reviews.author: NAP

customer_reviews.title: Cute but lasted 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this product looked it’s very cute. I bought it before the birth of my baby and started using it when my baby was born it lasted me about two weeks before it stopped working I ended up having to purchase another one from another brand shown in the picture. So value for money for me is nothing and because I bought it earlier in anticipation of my baby/ I was not able to return it or get it refund
customer_reviews.author: Alma T. Picado

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Not just for babies
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thermometer. It works way better than that stupid rubber duck that just turns a word a different color when it's hot. This actually gives you an accurate temperature reading and will beep at you when the water is too hot and even too cold for baby. We use this for all of my babies baths and will continue to use it. I even used it when I was pregnant so I could take a bath in a safe temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: audible sound is set way to low!
customer_reviews.text: The audible alarm is way to quite. You can barely hear it, and I think the water gets way to cold before it goes off. Didn't try it for hot water... disappointed in my purchase. If there is some way to turn up the sound, it would get better review.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Low Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Really low battery life, unfortunately. We used it to keep in kids bath water to let her learn what is too hot and what is too cold (she's autistic). This worked okay, but the battery didn't last long even after replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Dinosaur thermometer not as good as frog model
customer_reviews.text: Dinosaur thermometer not as good as frog model We are returning this product because it didn’t work very well. It was very disappointing because we bought the Turtle thermometer from the same company and had it for three years and it worked great For three years, But then stopped working consistently so we bought this one as a replacement. Unfortunately it doesn’t work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: Got this at the end of April and it worked great...until the end of May when it stopped working. Went to return it today and missed the deadline to return by 3 days! Kind of annoyed that I can't return it. I still have the instructions and it's supposed to notify you when there is a low battery...it never did so I don't think it's that. And if it is that then that's still pretty rediculous that the battery didn't even last a month.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited for this cute bath thermometer. It seemed to work okay for a couple uses and then after that it pretty much decided when it does and doesn't want to work. It's not a battery issue as it still turns on, it's just random.
customer_reviews.author: April M.

customer_reviews.title: Useful Tool/Toy
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly it doesn't require a switch to turn on/off. Just throw it in the water and it turns on automatically. Alarm is helpful for high/low temperatures. Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Fujiang

customer_reviews.title: Really glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: So far I used this 3 times and it seems accurate. I'm really glad I bought this because I've been using water that was way too cool for my baby. All the sites say the water should be warm to you elbow and whenever I'd do it, the water felt warm, but after measuring what I usually bathe my baby in I discovered the water only 80 degrees. pros - seems accurate - cute design - once baby gets older I think it will be a good toy. I figure after a while I'll learn exactly what the water temperature should feel like. Cons - none
customer_reviews.author: JP & CP

customer_reviews.title: Lasted long for us. Accurate and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Temperature has been accurate enough for bath time. Never had an issue with the water being too hot or too cold when within range. We've had it for almost 4 years and it's still going strong. I'm not even sure if this thing has replaceable batteries because we haven't changed them. Great little device.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P

customer_reviews.title: Came broken?
customer_reviews.text: We ordered for our home birth but when it came time to use it, it didn't work. My wife apparently tested it when it initially came and put it back in the box. The big moment came...I tossed this turtle in the water and nothing happened. It was too late to send back by then. Just our experience, seems like a really good product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Mardaffen

customer_reviews.title: Turning off while using
customer_reviews.text: Don't trust this thermometer. I had to return it. It worked very strange and showed different temperature. After few days it start turning off when I need it on to see the water temperature. Maybe it is because I received the used item.
customer_reviews.author: Ievgen

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't live without it.
customer_reviews.text: Both me and my husband love our water way to hot. We were having issues telling what the "correct" temperature would be. The last thing we want is a way to hot or too cold bath. This took all the guess work out of it for us. The little alarm goes off if we we aren't within the safe zone. It isn't overly loud, just a soft beeping. Our daughter has submerged this, and we haven't had any issues with it no longer reading or anything. I think it is cute, and one of the best bath time things I received at our baby shower!
customer_reviews.author: Kalhana

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We use this whenever we bath our baby. It works really well and alternates between Celsius and Fahrenheit. Some people complain that it wont shut up when you take it out of the water. However, if you read the manual, you'll know that the blue bottom twists off and you can dry off the probes and it goes quiet right away. Aside from that, we've had no issues and the product works exactly how it was intended. Our baby also loves the little turtle floating around that keeps a constant watch on the water temp.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Man

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute thermometer that has made bathtime a whole lot easier at our house. No more guessing or sampling the water with a kitchen thermometer. This is very fast, accurate, and our son loves to play with it. Automatically turns on/off based on water contact, and toggles between Celsius and Fahrenheit.
customer_reviews.author: RosaBianca

customer_reviews.title: Works until it doesn’t
customer_reviews.text: Works until it doesn’t . This works great for a few weeks and it’s super cute and easy BUT then it just stops working. I did a replacement the first time. Now the second one stopped working in less than a month. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Liane Corinaldi

customer_reviews.title: Great product...once it turns on.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thermometer for the peace of mind. It worked great for the first month. We have only been using it for three months and I've been having issues with it for a while. It has started to take a very long time to turn on. By the time it actually starts to work, the bath is practically full. It kind of defeats the purpose of having it. I used to be able to adjust the temperature of the water while it was filling, according to what the thermometer told me. Now, I'm doing it the old-fashioned way and using my hand to feel the water. I wouldn't recommend this product, especially at the price they charge.
customer_reviews.author: PFC

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Works well, does what is stated. It takes a minute or so at first for it to gather its senses and get the most correct temp, so don't go tossing your tot in the bath after the first temperature reading. This thermometer is kind of big for a baby tub but you don't have to keep it in there the whole time. I usually put it in for a minute before baby goes in, then a few minutes later I'll toss it back in real quick to check the temp again. It reads in Fahrenheit and Celsius.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S

customer_reviews.title: Alarm could be louder
customer_reviews.text: I love that it continously takes the temp and the numbers are large and easy to read. I think the audible alarm could be louder as I feel like I can barely hear it if the baby is making any kind of noise
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Peterson

customer_reviews.title: The temp display is ok but the buzer is barely audible...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if our unit is faulty but the buzzer is way too quite, so no real alarm capabilities, just the reading, meaning you have to visually check the temperature. I won't recommend that device for safety reasons I just added another 2 stars for Aquatopia customer a service: They sent me a replacement unit at no charge, thank you! I wish I could give you a 5 star but the sound is still weak to my sens...
customer_reviews.author: Pascal B.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for about 2 weeks. Ever since then, it has been shutting off constantly. Maybe stays on for 10 seconds here or there.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Overall I like it. Does its job well
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like it. Does its job well. Could use a few tweaks. 1. temperatures over 99.9 F are displayed with only three digits; I would like to see a fourth digit. 2. The beep is annoying, this is a pro and a con at the same time. It is supposed to be annoying, so I guess it is doing its job. 3. Easy to open the bottom to blow out the water from the contacts and turn it off. The contacts are showing signs of corrosion within the first week or two. 4. My son likes the floating turtle.
customer_reviews.author: B&K Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I have had better
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bath thermometer I have owned and the worst one. The prior was the Turtlemeter and it was perfect except that when the battery died you needed to get a new one. This thermometer has several flaws. 1. Gets water in the plastic causing it not to float level 2. The temp does not light up in colors 3. The temp keeps changing from between F and C, would rather just pick one 4. The over/under temp beeping is so low you cannot hear it when the watter is running I would skip this one and go with the Turtlemeter for a few extra bucks
customer_reviews.author: Mope

customer_reviews.title: This turtle was annoying with beeping
customer_reviews.text: When you have the first newborn you worry about everything. This turtle was annoying with beeping. One of the unneccassary baby stuff. I couldnt undertand if its too hot or too cold. My elbow is much better in telling the right tempreture. Giving 3 stars cause it is very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Aziza

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes his water really hot, and has had to learn that is was too hot for others. So thankfully with this, is has helped keep the babies water at a great temperature. When we are finished with it, I take it out of the water, shake what water i can out, and i have had no issues with is continuing to alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie Dean

customer_reviews.title: Stop hesitating and buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this thermometer. Its so easy to use and very accurate. Its bright colored so baby is entertained a little and we realized our bath temp was always off. I would highly recommend buying this as a gift or for yourself!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: It does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this overall for a $5 temp gauge. I would recommend waiting a few minutes while it takes the temperature before getting your actual read on it. Because it will gradually rise. Also if you leave it in the tub it will begin to beep. Just make sure to shake the water out and leave it to air dry and youre good. My baby likes to kick at it in her tub so its kind of like a temp and toy all in one.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but hard to get temp from water while it’s filling the tub...who wants to fill the tub then check it? It’s also a little larger than I expected so it makes it harder but not impossible to use in baby bathtub
customer_reviews.author: teresa f helmlinger

customer_reviews.title: incredibly handy!
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget has been a huge help! Since my own temperature seems to fluctuate so much, I don't trust myself to run my baby's water based on feel. On top of having the alarms for too hot or cold, the digital readout helps me get the water to my baby's favorite temperature. That auto on/off feature is really nice, you just have to remember to take it out of water when you're done so it shuts off. The only thing I would change is that the readout alternates between Celsius and Fahrenheit and it would be handy to have it sick on just Fahrenheit.
customer_reviews.author: MadMaxine

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate at all - dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is terrible. Was almost 10 degrees off. Was showing temp of 100 when it was 109. I bought this to check my babies bath water and had I not felt it and double checked with my kitchen candy thermometer I could have burned my baby. Should not be selling dangerously inaccurate products marketed for baby baths. Very dangerous if parents just trust it and put their baby in.
customer_reviews.author: Bri T

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: This was fantastic while it was working- it doubles as a toy at bath time. The reading was clear and alarm was helpful to know if the water was too hot or cold. However, we’ve had this less than two months and it has stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha Horn

customer_reviews.title: This is the best water thermometer we’ve seen
customer_reviews.text: This is the best water thermometer we’ve seen. Works quickly and accurately. The only complaint is the beeping “alarm” that sounds when temp reading is too hot or cold goes off for a while... so after the bath is drained it will beep for 5-10min.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped it would be!
customer_reviews.text: After a few first baths for my newborn we quickly realized how imperative it was to have a thermometer for the bath water, I purchased this one because it was super cute (looks like a bath toy) and because it beeps to tell you when the water is too hot or too cold. It works flawlessly and I love using it because it takes the guess worm out of setting the right water temperature, easy to operate, accurate. It's a little big for a newborn bath, so once we've set up the water, we take it out, but when my son gets older I look forward to leaving it in as a toy,
customer_reviews.author: Metuka

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for about 3 pr 4 months. Then started having issues: inaccurate temperature, screen going off after a few seconds in the water. I didn't bother bying a new one because by now I can figure out the temperatura using my wrist. But I was very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ma B.

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for my daughter's bath time. I wanted to make sure her water wasn't getting too hot or too cold. This thermometer works great! It stays off until it is in water which saves the battery and it beeps if the water is too hot or cold. As a bonus it's a super cute and my one and a half year old loves to play with it in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Mashburn

customer_reviews.title: Periodical cleaning needed
customer_reviews.text: This is widely available thermometer for baby baths. It's nice that it shows Fahrenheit and Celsius temps every other reading and baby loves the fun colors and turtle shape. The con is it gets waster scum and mildewy inside and you'd have to clean occasionally. If someone uses this which means they have a small child. Who has the time to clean it every time to make sure it doesn't contaminate the water your baby is in? I just use it and buy a new one when it's disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Somebody shut this turtle up!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a fun little contraption that serves a good purpose... but be warned it has no on/off switch. So it rings and rings even when you take it out of the water. My wife and I find ourselves throwing the turtle under pillows or in closets so we don't have to listen to it as it dries out in a beeping fury. We pass each other in the hall, exchange a look, say "The Turtle!" and move on. I have gone back to the trusted finger in the water. Seems to have worked for every generation before ours.
customer_reviews.author: KateE

customer_reviews.title: Cute bath themomether makes toddler bathing safe
customer_reviews.text: I have used this bath thermometer since I brought my baby home from the hospital (he is 22 months now). This is actually my second one. I had to replace the first one because my little boy likes to play with it and is very rough on things. It is accurate and quickly gives a reading. It has an alarm that is clear but not annoying when the tempurature is to hot or cold. I have never had my little boy refuse a bath because of water tempurature since using this to make sure I have the tempurature right.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for less than 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Love how this updates the temp so quickly. It has ended the battles between DH and I of "it's too cold" vs. "it's too hot." Should have bought this for the first baby! One-star deduction for the product not being safe enough for the kids to play with/mouth. I'm guessing it's not BPA-free... Updated from 4 stars to 1 star because product stopped working after a few weeks. Water got into the display and it stopped reading the water temp. Useless! Thank you Amazon for refunding my money.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz

customer_reviews.title: Good thermometer
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly, although it takes a few minutes until the temperature reading is accurate. We used this to make sure our birth pool was at a proper temperature and for the first few months to bathe our daughter. It's worked better than other thermometers so far, but older children dropped it on the floor a few times and now the sensor is a bit wonky. It served it's purpose though, and it's not too expensive to replace if we need to later on.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Schindlbeck

customer_reviews.title: Spend more, get something better
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk. I know it’s only 9 dollars but it never even worked for me. Unfortunately it was part of a baby registry and was too late to return when I finally went to use it and realized it didn’t even work. I took it apart and the battery was corroded and it seems a capacitor might have went bad as well. Spend more and get a better product
customer_reviews.author: Greg Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong 2.5 years later
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thermometer while pregnant so I could ensure my baths weren't too hot, and it's still going strong now that my kid is 2 years old! It seems to be accurate. My only complaint is that sometimes it doesn't realize it's not in the water anymore and beeps because it gets too cold. If you have found this review helpful, please give me a positive vote!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: ok at first
customer_reviews.text: It checks the temp every two seconds but it doesn't show you the actual temperature until it has been in the water for about a minute because it gradually figures out what temperature it is. So if the temperature changes fast it doesn't notice right away. It worked decently for the first few weeks but then it stopped recognizing that it had been taken out of the water unless you shake the water out of it for about a minute or two. So it starts beeping thinking that it's still in the water and the temperature is too cold or something.
customer_reviews.author: lib

customer_reviews.title: Works well, keeps the little one entertained.
customer_reviews.text: We bough this one because of the reviews and the price. This was priced well, looked like it was quality and could keep the little one busy in the tub. For the $10 we paid it kept our conscience clear. Our dr said just test the temperature of the water by the back of your hand by your wrist and while that was OK, we didn't want to take any chances. We do not use this anymore, but the battery never died, it always worked, and even if it is tossed around or dropped, or used as a toy for a very active little boy, it does not break!
customer_reviews.author: akhetani

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a fun bath!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent presentation, measure the temperature in Celsius and Fahrenheit and perfect for gift!
customer_reviews.author: Elena L.

customer_reviews.title: Cute Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I used this for keeping the temperature just right in my little one’s bath and it met all my expectations. Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Service
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these for a few years & it started break-down. Ordered another that had a problem, the company immediately replaced it. Great to see a company stand behind their products! If needed, I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Carthurs

customer_reviews.title: Low alarm sound....wish it had bluetooth alarm to my smartphone
customer_reviews.text: The concept is good. The device alarm sound is so low, that if you have water stream (like shower or faucet) running, you wont be able to hear it. So in effect, it is not adding any value. I understand, the challenge that they had to put the speaker inside a water proof casing, blocking the sound. What would have worked better is, a bluetooth alarm to my smart phone. I would pay more to get a product that would have smartphone alarm, rather than trying to do anything more complicated to produce louder alarm. I had to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: critic007

customer_reviews.title: So much better than other thermometers out there!
customer_reviews.text: I received a few bathtub thermometers at my baby shower, and none of them turned out to be as easy to use as this one. They don't give this away; at $15, there are definitely more inexpensive thermometers out there, but none I've found have been as easy to use. The display is easy to read, the audible alarms (for too-hot and too-cold water temps) makes it so easy to tell when my son's bathwater is just right. The thermometer itself is cute and my 10-month old son loves playing with it as it floats around his baby bathtub. I love this so much that I've given it as a gift at several baby showers since.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Fix

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, fast, and cute to boot!
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is the answer to one of a new mom's greatest fears: too hot bath water. And it is oh so cute as well! The thermometer beeps continually if the temperature of the water leaves the appropiate temperature range--too hot or too cold. It's great how fast it registers the temperature after it is placed in the water. It turns itself on when in water and off when out of water. Baby loves to play with it. Just have to make sure it is returned to upright position if baby tips it upside down. Simply a lovely bath safety tool.
customer_reviews.author: AThriftyMom

customer_reviews.title: Corroded
customer_reviews.text: It work but I had to change the battery. Was corroded with acid.
customer_reviews.author: Jamel Hall

customer_reviews.title: Better safe than sorry
customer_reviews.text: As new parents this was one of the best buys we have made. Bathing the baby in the right temperature water is so important! We use it every time the baby has a bath. We use around 36.5 on cold days and around 34-35 on hotter days. A must have if you want to be sure the baby is not getting too hot or too cold water to bathe. I know for years parents depend on their touch to determine if the temperature is ok, but just to make sure we got this.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money! Try a different product!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Don’t waste your money. After replacing the battery multiple times it only works for about a half of a second and then it’s dead again...
customer_reviews.author: CBerry

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Product is cute and works very well so far! Our baby thinks it’s one of his toys and plays with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ehranvee

customer_reviews.title: 2nd kid 2nd turtle
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these for our 1st child and still used it up until she was 2 1/2 then it quit working. Could have been the battery, but we decided with the new baby we would just replace it with a new turtle. My daughter loves the turtle. It is nice that it floats and gives off an accurate temperature. I like really hot water for myself, so this helps me to make sure the temp for the kids baths is not to hot. We saw some at the store and they were not as nice and higher priced than this one. I would recommend this for anyone with kids.
customer_reviews.author: formercheesehead

customer_reviews.title: Only worked once
customer_reviews.text: I gave this one star only because it stopped working correctly after one use. At first it continuously told the temp as it was in water and every other time now, I have to take it out of the water and put it back in. I’m going to try getting a new battery for it but I’m very disappointed. I really like it when it works.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Charles

customer_reviews.title: Cute thermometer
customer_reviews.text: A bit large to use in a baby bath tub, but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: I heart prime

customer_reviews.title: VERY CUTE
customer_reviews.text: This water temperature thermometer for babies is very cute and works well. It does however keep giving the water temperature alarm sound until it is dry. Ours lasted through two babies then called it a day.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeyefanjustin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work correctly
customer_reviews.text: I threw away the box, otherwise I would have returned it. It reads the temperature ...but it says LOW always! And it’s always beeping low, even if it’s 110F!
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great Item to have.
customer_reviews.text: At the begining I decided that I don't need thermometer to give a bath to my twins. I always put thermostat to 100 and give kids a bath. But sometimes I began worry if the woater either warm or Cold enough. next day I bought Aquatopia Deluxe Safety Bath Thermometer Alarm, I tried it and was SO HAPPY with this item :) after I take the baby out and start feeding :) something start beeping so we had no idea what it is. later on we figured it out that this is alarm beeping that the water is cold for the baby :)
customer_reviews.author: First Time Mom

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: A little glitchy. It sometimes takes a little while to turn on after being placed in the water. And then it also shuts off before I'm done filling the bath. But if you shake it around it turns back on and gives an accurate reading. I usually just use it long enough to get the bathtub filled then take it out. My daughter doesn't stay in the bath long enough for the water to get too cold anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This gives.me so much piece of mind when bathing my little one. It’s a stressful time at first and this takes the guess work out of is it to hot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My baby still hates baths, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: at least I know the temperature is right! I purchased this thermometer because my newborn baby hated taking baths and I got concerned I was making the bath too hot or too cold, when what I was looking for was Goldilocks's "just right." This thermometer has been very helpful in ensuring I have the right temperature and that's not the reason my baby hates baths! Overall, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M.

customer_reviews.title: Love, first time mommy
customer_reviews.text: Never bath without it! Love this little guy. Helps take the guessing game out of bath time.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Prebeg

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This was helpful in the beginning to make sure the water wasn't too hot for our daughter. One big thing I didn't like is that it would randomly beep for a long time after removing it from the water either during or at the end of bath time. If there's a trick to preventing that, I didn't figure it out. My daughter liked to play with it, so it doubled as a bath toy.
customer_reviews.author: Trekkie

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% accurate
customer_reviews.text: Works! I would caution you to not rely on this as being true and accurate. Test the water with yourself before placing a child in the water. After a few years of use the batteries have held up great.
customer_reviews.author: RoNiNLSJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for a little while
customer_reviews.text: Product only lasted for 3 months. When it worked it was great but that time was very limited
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Jauregui

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but wouldnt shut off (once)
customer_reviews.text: We were quite happy with the product at first. We actually bought it pre-baby so my wife could monitor her bath's temp. However, the last time we used it it wouldn't turn off, in/out of water didn't matter. Ultimately I had to take it a part before it would stop. Its ok for now, but we haven't used it since that time. May come back to update review later if problem persists.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Landes

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Already broken. We used it for about 3 weeks and it stopped working, I assumed batteries needed replaced, nope, just wont work.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M. Dilbeck

customer_reviews.title: Thermometer works well. Recently we've been having a hard ...
customer_reviews.text: Thermometer works well. Recently we've been having a hard time getting it to stop beeping once bath is over. Sometimes it beeps for HOURS and we have to bury it in a bathroom drawer (anyone see the Friends episode where Phoebe can't get the smoke detector to stop beeping...) And other times it stops beeping within a few minutes of being out the water. Maybe it needs new batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great for the bathtub & hot tub!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered this for the bath tub, but decided to give it a try in the hot tub. Works great in both. Love it! Very cute, battery came with it. Beeped when the water was too cold until the right temperature was reached. Also beeped when the water was too hot. It got tossed around a bit by our older son, and it didn't break, which is a huge bonus! :) Would definitely recommend as a baby shower gift, or for new & experienced families!
customer_reviews.author: Object

customer_reviews.title: it sometimes looks like water got in there
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a couple days, but then it started to give inaccurate temp readings... it would say the water temp was much lower than it actually was (verified w/ a different thermometer).. I'm not sure if it's because somehow some water got into the mechanism or what, but in the read out area, it sometimes looks like water got in there.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It's cute! It's an awesome thermometer and can double as a bath toy. It's activated by water so you don't have to worry about the battery(which is easily replaceable) and it's accurate. I have heard horror stories about people not knowing that babies can't withstand really hot water, and that is tragic when it's such a simple solution. I recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: kkTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea. Doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this a couple of times. Once, 4 years ago when my son was born and, again, about one year ago when my daughter was born. It lasted longer the first time, but both times it eventually stopped measuring the temperature accurately (my recently purchased one would just stop measuring the temperature completely and I'd have to bob it in and out of the water a few times for it to turn back on). It's really cute looking and my 4 year old son loved the idea of playing with it in the bathtub, but I had to throw it away after just a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Outball

customer_reviews.title: It is cute and it works!
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer is very accurate. I changed the temp several times and it kept up just fine. The thing is though that the alarm is really really quiet so if the water is on you can't hear it. Of course it is easier to put the kiddo in while the bath is still going especially on the late nights. So be cautious. It is a great tool but doesn't replace being diligent with water temp safety.
customer_reviews.author: schocksie

customer_reviews.title: Works: Simple, Safe, and Easy
customer_reviews.text: I waited till my second baby to buy this because I really didn't think it was a necessity. It is super nice to have and beeps when water is too hot or too cold for baby, which makes things a little easier at bath time. My 3 yr old popped it apart and I thought he had broke it, but, I found it was the first step in the replacing battery: It was still safe because he would need a screwdriver to go any further.
customer_reviews.author: Stisty

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t tell correct temperature
customer_reviews.text: Terrible does not tell the correct temperature the water is still cold and it says it’s perfect temp. Don’t trust this keep your money
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Very frustrating to use.
customer_reviews.text: What a frustrating product. Takes forever to measure, is not accurate and after measuring you have to dry it before doing another measurement. It is a hassle. Looks great but useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and works well!
customer_reviews.text: Very useful for us since we bath our child in the tub with us. It does make this REALLY annoying beeping sound if the water is too hot and it doesn't stop until the unit is cooled down, which takes some time even if you remove it from the water. It would be nice if it had some manual button you could push to turn the alarm off.
customer_reviews.author: JRB

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: It works. Will beep if the water is too cold or too hot.
customer_reviews.author: betsy morales

customer_reviews.title: Great concept
customer_reviews.text: The alarm could be louder for someone like me who’s hard of hearing. Other than that I feel it’s a great little bath time addition
customer_reviews.author: Everett Shull

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble correctly gauging the right bath temperature for my newborn so I grabbed this - I love it. It measures the temp every few seconds so I can monitor it as it changes, while the water is running. Once the bath is full enough and at a temp I like I remove it, turn the water off, and put the baby in. He is MUCH happier at bath time - I was running the water way too cold for fear of burning his delicate skin, but I shoot for a 96 degree bath now and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I've got two toddlers and one really doesn't like his bath water too warm. This works great both from a safety stand point (it warns for both low and high temps) and from a convience stand point (I now know I just have to set the temp around 98 degrees and my older son doesn't complain). It's also pretty sturdy: both my kids use it as a toy now and then and it's withstood being tossed out of the tub a few times. Overall a well designed product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect safety item for bathtime
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to make sure that the bath water was not too hot for my son. As a first-time mom, I wasn't confident enough to make this judgment based on feeling the water with my hand. Also, I wanted my husband, who is the main bath-giver, to have a guideline, since he seems to be able to tolerate water at much higher temperatures than me. It's wonderful to be able to place this gadget directly in the water and have it give back a temperature reading in seconds. If it's too hot, it will continue to sound a soft alarm until the water reaches a safe temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great for new parents
customer_reviews.text: This turtle bath thermometer worked great when giving my baby a bath. As a new parent I was always concerned if the bath water was to hot or cold, and this helped ease our mind.
customer_reviews.author: Tojo

customer_reviews.title: Fine but not needed
customer_reviews.text: Works as it claims to - clear temperature read and accurate alarm system. In my opinion, if is not a necessary baby product though because my hand read tells me the same information and is less clutter to the bathroom! Now that I am on my second child and this has been sitting around, I totally would have skipped the purchase if I could go back in time.
customer_reviews.author: kmh

customer_reviews.title: was great to use
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well for about the first six months, was great to use. It's now starting to act a bit dodgy with regard to starting up or shutting down. I haven't tried to troubleshoot the problem, so perhaps some cleaning or fresh batteries would restore proper operation. Even so, this thermometer was great to use, and my baby loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Totally awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I used to use a thermometer that measures steam milk temp to measure baby's bath water. Got too irritating so I found this little gadget. It's great! The battery is installed out of the box, you simply put it in water and it starts showing you the temp of the water. I try to keep it at 95-97 range since it's the middle ground. Baby loves the bath now and never screamed cuz of hot water anymore... It's pretty big, like toy size. I guess that was the intention of it for being a toy thermometer. For 5 bucks, it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: C. Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly. So excited to see my littles ones joy using it
customer_reviews.author: Alexia

customer_reviews.title: This is great to use when bathing my son
customer_reviews.text: This is great to use when bathing my son. First time Mom here so I was unsure of how warm the water was. This puts my mind at ease and is super fun to have in the bath.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Nice, useful, and easy to use product.
customer_reviews.text: This baby bath thermometer makes bathing easy and care-free. Helps relieve the stress related to being sure whether the bath water is either too hot or cold.
customer_reviews.author: Vihar V. Krastev

customer_reviews.title: This is nice to have
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest thing! I am always so scared the bath water is too hot. I bought this so I would know the temperature. It beeps fast if the water is too hot and slow when it gets too cold. This is nice to have, because my little one loves his baths!
customer_reviews.author: Tess Alsup

customer_reviews.title: water wild
customer_reviews.text: I am so, so happy I bought this! I have zero ability to gauge the temp of water because, for me, I like my showers hot. So, out of fear of possibly burning my baby, I knew I needed some help in this area. This cute little gadget tells me the perfect range for the tub and lets me know when I get the water too hot, which usually happens. I use it every time and it has helped make bath time more enjoyable for baby.
customer_reviews.author: .nicole.

customer_reviews.title: When finished using it beeps for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm, till your finished with the bath, takes a while to shake the water out to stop the beeping
customer_reviews.author: Anderine

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product ! I am pregnant still and use it in my bathtub and jacuzzi to make sure the water temp is not too high for baby as overheating can be dangerous for the foetus. I plan on using when baby will be out too. So it's solid so far, checks temp every 2 secs, is very precise, practical as it floats and beeps when temp gets higher than body temp. Perfect !
customer_reviews.author: Maelle P.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was great as I was a new mom who was worried about not only getting my baby's water temperature too hot, but also having it too cold. This thermometer is great and tells you the temperature every couple of seconds so you know if the water is cooling down also. I have a newborn so she doesn't use this as a toy yet but I'm sure she will as soon as she can grab a hold of it. It is so cute and does what I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: MFischerRickard

customer_reviews.title: A noisy turtle!
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer does its job nicely, alarm you when the water is too hot or too cold, I have no complaint on its functionality. It is the beeping noise that bother both my baby and I. The beepings are just too annoying. I find the bottom cover, which seems like protecting the sensor rod, is useless. It just collects water inside, making it take longer to dry after use. I just use it without the bottom cover since day one.
customer_reviews.author: the shopping penguin

customer_reviews.title: This is so nice to stick in the bathtub to check the temperature ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice to stick in the bathtub to check the temperature and not have to worry about if it's too hot or too cold. No more checking the tub a hundred times, this has an alarm that goes off when the temperature reaches the perfect temperature!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Decker

product_meta.title: AQUATOPIA Floating Safety Bath Thermometer for Infants, Digital Audible Alarm, Beeps when too hot or too cold! (Green)
product_meta.description:
Color:GreenAquatopia Safety Bath Time Audible Thermometer
Make Bath time safe time!
Audible water activated bath thermometer accurately measures water temperature & sounds an alarm if too hot or too cold.
Also makes a great bath toy!

Battery Included (LR44)

Flashes "LO" when its time to change battery

Compliant to safety standards

Sensor activated turns on when placed in water, turns off automatically when taken out of water

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Aquatopia deluxe safety bath thermometer alarm is the easy to use safety bath time audible thermometer and eliminates hazardous guesswork by constantly and accurately measuring the bath temperature every 2 seconds. The thermometer alerts you with an audible alarm if the water is too hot, above 100.4 degree F, and another alarm if the water is too cold, below 89.6 degree F. This battery powered and water activated thermometer automatically activates when placed in water and de-activates when taken out. It is fully tested to meet all necessary safety standards and it also makes a great toy. It is easy to use with no buttons.
feature_bullets: Easy to use Alerts you with an audible alarm if the water is too hot (100.4~F/38~C) and if too cold below (89.6~F/32~C)
Makes a great, fun toy as well
Kids and Toddler Bath time digital Thermometer
